name: VR Space Adventure
description:
VR Space Adventure is virtual reality mobile game with shooting gameplay.
Catch the enemy leader by shooting down incoming asteroids and enemy spacecrafts. Take control of your spaceship, fight with your opponents and dive into VR experience with stunning 3D graphics in complete 360º head movement.

How to play:
• Navigate your spaceship, avoid and destroy various traps and enemies
• Travel through beautiful atmospheric locations
• Survive deadly chases using different weapons and tactics
• It works perfectly with most of a VR glasses (headsets).
• We recommend you to use headphone for the best immersion.

VR Space Adventure is compatible with all virtual reality devices :
Homido VR
Archos VR
Dive VR
FreeFly VR
FIBRUM VR
Cmoar
Vrase
Zeiss VR One
Lick VR
